name: Bike Racing - Free
description:
The best Bike Racing game!
Feel the thrill! Come drive your taxi through beautiful and dangerous mountains.
Bike Racing Free is an exciting, action packed Bike Racing game. Navigate through beautiful mountains and a gorgeous terrain. Ride your Bike through curvy paths on amazing mountains, but be careful on treacherous turns. If you fall, your game will be over.
Get ready to play the most exciting Bike Racing game! Each level of Bike Racing Free is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one!
With Bike Racing Free you will feel like a real Biker. Be the Bike Racer in the world . Feel the thrill of driving and steering on realistic mountains, with Bike Racing Free!
FEATURES of Bike Racing Free:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Scenic environment with mountains and trees
- Smooth and realistic Bike handling
- Realistic game sounds
- Tilt steering
- Different Bikes to choose from
- Easy to learn and drive
Bike Racing Free is simple, yet challenging to play. Just tilt your phone to steer your Bike to the left or right. Touch or press the gas (right) button to speed up and push the brakes (left) button to slow down. Bike Racing Free is an exciting taxi game that will get your adrenaline pumping!
So what are you waiting for?
Get Bike Racing Free now and have fun Riding your big bike in beautiful huge mountains!
